table.name: vtiger_salesplanequipment
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_salesplanequipment` ( `salesplanequipmentid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `equiment` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `region` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`salesplanequipmentid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_salesplanequipmentcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_salesplanequipmentcf` ( `salesplanequipmentid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`salesplanequipmentid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
